profile:
Licensed Custom Home Designers, Serving Niagara, Hamilton, Brant, Haldimand and all Ontario for over 38 years.
-Designed over 5000+ new custom homes & additions
-We pay personal attention to each stage of the design process
-We allow for un-limited changes & fixed design fees
-We also offer 3D colour renderings & HVAC Design
-We design bungalows, two storeys, cottages, garage, storey & 1/2, raised bungalows, estate homes
